name: Depthis
description:
Depthis is a sandbox game about underwater exploration and creativity.

Depthis is in incredibly early stages and there is currently not much content, which is why it's free. When Depthis gains more content the price will also go up.

Here is a list of what Depthis has to offer in it's current form:

Pick up crates, underwater physics and random level generation.

Have fun!
